name: TETRIS -created by ZEN (alpha.)
description:
SCORING:
0-100 points : Placing the tetromino down faster than it falls using the soft drop button. (probably needs to be nerfed)
40 points + Level * 20 : Clearing a single line
100 points + Level * 25 : Clearing two lines with one piece
300 points + Level * 50: Clearing three lines with one piece
1200 points + Level * 100: Clearing a TETRIS with one piece

LEVELS:
Levels increase every 10 lines you clear until you reach level 10 which is the max speed level.
Level One: 1x Speed
Level Two: 2x Speed
Level Three: 3x Speed
Level Four: 4x Speed
Level Five: 5x Speed
Level Six: 6x Speed
Level Seven: 7x Speed
Level Eight: 8x Speed
Level Nine: 9x Speed
Level Ten: 9.5x Speed

GAME LOG

4/7/2020 6:30am - TETRIS first started development
4/7/2020 7:30pm - TETRIS beta. released
- Tetrominos can be created
- Tetrominos can be moved and rotated and soft dropped
- Lines can be cleared
- Scoring system implemented
- Line counting implemented
- Basic sound effects

5/7/2020 11:30pm - TETRIS alpha. released
-Major movement update (spicy movement)
- Score and Line counter bug fixed
- SFX changed
- Music added (amazing)
- Level system added (speeds up)
- Score system refined and improved)
- Basic menu added
